title: Powers: The Definitive Collection Vol. 4 (Hardcover)
description:
The deluxe hardcover collections continue, and this one is the biggest yet by more than 100 pages! Combining POWERS VOL. 8: LEGENDS, POWERS VOL. 9: PSYCHOTIC and POWERS VOL. 10: COSMIC, plus all the extras you expect to see in a beautiful oversized collection! In LEGENDS, a hero returns, and Deena is put through the ringer; in PSYCHOTIC, Deena struggles with her dark secret, and another Power ends up dead; and in COSMIC, a cosmic guardian of our galaxy turns up dead, and lands Walker and Pilgrim knee-deep in cosmic doo-doo. Histories revealed and characters going through some major changes, you won�t want to miss it! Collecting POWERS VOL. 2 #1-18.
Mature �$34.99 
ISBN: 978-0-7851-5316-0
